text: Chongqing Art Museum () (also known as Chongqing Art Gallery or Chongqing Guotai Arts Center) is an art museum in Yuzhong District of Chongqing.重庆美术馆昨开馆：10米空高打造天空之城，人民网。 Its main focus is on traditional Chinese painting, printmaking, and small sculptures.https://www.hunterdouglasarchitectural.com/referenceprojects/article.jsp?pId=8a81c1133ca0939d013cdeb221bb0434https://www.ichongqing.info/2019/02/28/eye- catching-museums-in-chongqing-provide-ideal-destinations-for-a-date-with-art/ ==Architecture== The building is well known for its striking architecture. Its outer structure consists of an interwoven pattern of beams. Red beams run north–south and black beams run east–west.https://www.archdaily.com/895528/photo-series-provides-an- abstracted-look-at-chinas-iconic-architecture The design is said to be inspired by Chopsticks and the traditional Chinese meal of Hot pot.http://english.sina.com/culture/p/2015/1210/872636.html ==References== Category:2013 establishments in China Category:Museums established in 2013 Category:Art museums established in 2013 Category:Museums in Chongqing Category:Art museums and galleries in China
title: Chongqing Art Museum
